name: QUAD DEATH: Core Meltdown EX
description:
YOU are a SPECIALIST QUAD FACE and the last resort of NUCLEAR VOMIT CORP.'s insurance company to save MILLIONS OF LIVES AND MONEY from imminent DEATH BY NUCLEAR ACCIDENT... navigate a complex NUCLEAR PLANT at BLAZING SPEED and harness THE POWER OF ELECTRICITY... DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES?

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys/Left stick: Move your QUAD FACE
Spacebar/Button 1: Press and release to JUMP
HOLD Spacebar: BOOST upwards
HOLD Spacebar + direction: Directional BOOST

Credits:

fotocopiadora: design, programming, art, sound effects, music
Mariken S.: QUAD FACE design
Nikki Bee: Mariken S.: testing
ihitokage, recklessgoomba, thiagoassis82ter, wilhelboy, benboncan, breiti, kijadzel, parabolix, pluralz, jorickhoofd, alineaudio, inspectorj, reitanna (@ freesound): sound effects

Made for marbles-box as part of the Santa in Spring Glorious Trainwrecks event... hope you like it!

GODSPEED
